sect1.title: indent
sect1.para: This indents a string on each line, default is 4. As an optional parameter, you can specify the number of characters to indent. As an optional second parameter, you can specify the character to use to indent with eg use "\t" for a tab.

row.entry: This determines how many characters to indent to.
This is the character used to indent with.
